column4: if you right click a folder in gnome and click Share Folder, how do you access it from another computer on the network?
depends on the computer
its an ubuntu
i meant the other computer
yeh :) 2 computers with ubuntu
well you should just have to open a gnome window and go to Network
thats the thing, it doesnt come up :/
well are you sharing it with Samba or--?
NFS is the only option i have
well is NFS what you want to use?
basically, yeh.
simple file swapping is all i need
well i guess go to Places > Connect to Server then
tried that too :?
and does NFS show up there as an option?
hm, perhaps try install nfs-common then?
or you could use samba
ok, ive got samba sharing from 1 computer, but still no sign of it from the other
and what happens when you try connecting to it
shows nothing
these two computers are on the same subnet, yes?
yeh
can you ping one from the other
yep. can play games too
